Key Match Events: Gurbaz and Ibrahim added a 154-run opening stand
Fazalhaq Farooqi took his maiden five-wicket haul in T20Is
Afghanistan's 183 for 5 was too much for Uganda, who were bowled out for 58 runs in 16 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Gurbaz made his 76 off 45 balls with four sixes and as many fours
Ibrahim struck nine fours and a six in his 46-ball 70
Pace blows away Uganda's top half
Miscellaneous Highlights: Uganda would, however, take heart from their comeback with the ball
Afghanistan lost 5 for 31 in the last six overs of their innings to finish well below 200
Ramjani then had Gurbaz hole out to deep square leg in the following over
Farooqi had Gulbadin Naib caught at long-on for four, and then in the final over, Azmatullah Omarzai skied one to short third
It was Uganda's first appearance at a World Cup, and Afghanistan underlined the gulf between the two sides
